tool_name: Metal music news from Metal Injection
tool_description: Fetch metal music news (14 different genres) from Metal Injection
title: Metal music news from Metal Injection

api_list.name: All Metal Music News
api_list.description: This endpoint will output all metal music news from Metal Injection (all genres).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metal-music-news-from-metal-injection.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metal-music-news-from-metal-injection.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Metal music news filtered by genre name
api_list.description: This endpoint outputs news based on entered genre name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metal-music-news-from-metal-injection.p.rapidapi.com/news/{genre_name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metal-music-news-from-metal-injection.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
